title: Number of available apps in the Apple App Store 2008 to 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of available apps for 24 number of Months.
The Number of available apps is highest at Month Jan '17 and lowest at Month Jul '08.
The highest Month Jan '17 has 2199200.0 more Number of available apps than the lowest Month Jul '08.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of available apps for 24 number of Months.
The Number of available apps is appeared to be the highest at Month Jan '17 and lowest at Month Jul '08.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of available apps for 24 number of Months.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of available apps for 24 number of Months.
The maximum Number of available apps 2200000.0 is found at Month Jan '17 and the minimum is found at Jul '08 where Month is 800.0.
The second highest Number of available apps is appeared to be the Month Jun '16.
The difference of Number of available apps between the highest and lowest Month is 2199200.0.
Month Jan '17 is higher than any other Months with value 2200000.0, followed by Jun '16, and Jun '15. Down to Month Jul '08 with the lowest value 800.0.
Over the past 24 Months, the Number of available apps has lowered.
The lowest value 800.0 at Jul '08 is almost 3.06 times smaller than the average value 718283.33.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 17238800.0.
